title: Mizuho plans to say no to Yes Bank deal; it's SMBC vs Emirates NDB
description: Mizuho has withdrawn from the bid for a significant stake in Yes Bank, leaving Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation and Emirates NBD as the main contenders. Yes Bank is seeking a new owner, four years after a central bank-led rescue. The SBI denied selling its stake in the bank.
